name: Ao carón da Lareira
description:
A narrative-based game about galician mythology through the eyes of a grandson and the stories his grandfather tells him by the fireside. 

Voiced by - Pablo Bello Yáñez

Available in English, Galician and Spanish.

WASD, Lshift & mouse, that's all you need to know!

____________________________________________________________________________________

Updated 11/08 (5:36): Fixed some bugs related to the subtitles and conversation issues in the dialogue tree from the second scene.
